New AnyDVD blacklists all prior keys leaked to the net. 

1. Exit AnyDVD from tray 
2. 2x click on the NEW key. 
3. !!! Pull out the internet plug !!!
4. Install & reboot 
5. In Prog. Settings uncheck "Automatically check..."
6. !!! Connect internet plug !!!

Worked for me, thank you for the upload. I followed these steps:

1. Removed previous AnyDVD and the registration information
2. Rebooted
3. Installed new AnyDVD
4. Copied reg file to install dir, executed
5. Rebooted
